ComicInfo.Summary:
“Order up!” Bob’s Burgers Ongoing Comic Book is ready to serve you more sizzling stories in Issue #6! Louise’s suspicions lead her on a quest for pests; Captain Gene-o’s voyage continues in the clouds; and Tina tells a tale of two star-crossed lovers in Tineo & Jimmy Juliet. Bob’s Burgers is an animated sitcom that airs on Fox television with other hits such as The Simpsons and Family Guy!
ContentsTina's Erotic Friend Fiction Presents: Tineo & Jimmy Juliet, Part 1Louise's Unsolved Mysteries and Curious Curiosities Presents: Pester-geist, Part 2Gene's Rhymey Rhymes That Could One Day Be Songs Presents: Captain Gene-o, Part 2*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Brittany McCarthy | 1 | B | Cover B | Paul Claerhout | 2 | C/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Brittany McCarthy | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-29 20:24:22. [CVDB507194]
ComicInfo.Writer: Ben Dickerson, Jeff Drake, Mark Von Der Heide
ComicInfo.Penciller: Alexandra Gallant, Frank Forte, Kimball Shirley, Tom Connolly, Tom Connor
ComicInfo.Inker: Alexandra Gallant, Frank Forte, Kimball Shirley, Tom Connolly, Tom Connor
ComicInfo.Colorist: Derek Schroeder, Frank Forte, Liezl Buenaventura
ComicInfo.Characters: Bob Belcher, Gene Belcher, Linda Belcher, Louise Belcher, Tina Belcher
